p: Raw garlic contains many active phytochemicals like alkaloids, flavonoids, cardiac glycosides, terpenes and steroids, resin. It also contains some sulfur compounds, such as alliin, allicin, ajoene, diallyl sulfide, enzymes, B-vitamins, proteins, minerals, saponins, flavonoids, etc., which are not Sulphur-containing compounds [ 81, 82, 83, 84].
